name: Character Plush Toys
description: Tags: soft plush, cute, studio lighting
template: A soft, high-quality plush toy of {character}, with an oversized head, small body, and stubby limbs. Made of fuzzy fabric with visible stitching and embroidered facial features. The plush is shown sitting or standing against a neutral background. The expression is cute or expressive, and it wears simple clothes or iconic accessories if relevant. Lighting is soft and even, with a realistic, collectible plush look. Centered, full-body view.
